creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Body of shirt made with brown ground cloth with narrow maroon, yellow, & grey-green warp stripes; 4 rows of small decorative motifs in weft patterning; sleeves and collar made of cloth of maroon with weft stripes in grey-green, purple, red; small motifs as on body of shirt.
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Man's shirt (Camisa)
